symbol: {Stock Symbol name as registered on any stock exchange}
notificationCount: 'default' (Always but as long as service/application is running) / {Number} (Notifications will stop after this count) / 0 (no notifications)
interval: 'default' (15 minutes) / {Number} (interval duration in minutes, minimum = 1, maximum = 24*60)
dayNightDuration: 'default' (24 Hours but as long as service/application is running) / 'generalDayTime' (08:00 to 22:30 system time and on weekdays) / 'UStime' (for NASDAQ and NSE) / CETtime (for XETRA, FRA)
buy_price: {Decimal Number} / (leave blank if buy notification not required) / '{Min/Max/BelowAverage/AboveAverage} {Number}{D for days, M for months}' / 'PAT[{Intraday/Days}][{Up/Down} {Up/Down} ...n times] [{number} {number} ...n times]'
sell_price: {Decimal Number} / (leave blank if sell notification not required) / '{Min/Max/BelowAverage/AboveAverage} {Number}{D for days, M for months}' / 'PAT[{Intraday/Days}][{Up/Down} {Up/Down} ...n times] [{number} {number} ...n times]'
